author: andschwa
body:
Resolves #1104.

This was mandated by the Open Source Programs Office and Open Source Executive Council, and it's a good code of conduct, which we were missing.

/cc @jianyunt @DonGill @joeyaiello

comments.author: vors
comments.body: To be honest, I didn't have a chance to read the doc itself. Did we **actually** adopt it?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: We've been told to adopt it. And that's funny, the links they have us were working earlier today. I'll see what happened Monday.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Fixed to use their new links.

comments.author: jianyunt
comments.body: @joeyaiello owns the governance. But I think we need to cover the Code Conduct. thx Andy.

title: Add official Microsoft Open Source Code of Conduct
